snippet: Mr. Allen will be the recipient of the 2014 Cecil B. DeMille Lifetime Achievement Award, which is given annually during the Golden Globes in January.
abstract: Hollywood Foreign Press Association announces that Woody Allen will be recipient of 2014 Cecil B DeMille Lifetime Achievement Award given during Golden Globes; Allen is unlikely to accept award in person, as he normally does not attend award events.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Allen will be the recipient of the 2014 Cecil B. DeMille Lifetime Achievement Award, which is given annually during the Golden Globes in January.

headline.print_headline: Will Woody Allen Show Up This Time?
headline.main: Will Woody Allen Show Up This Time?
